intro:
Fish, sell, upgrade, and dive deeper and deeper into an ocean full of secrets.
Collect the entire ARCTICDEX!
description:
Between freezing waters and mysterious depths, dive ever deeper in search of rare fish and the unknown. By selling its catches, the penguin unlocks upgrades, equipment, and access to deeper areas.

Collect all 42 Arctic monsters to complete your ARCTICDEX.

Gameplay Features

● 2D platformer with vertical exploration. Control an explorer penguin that progressively descends through underwater environments, combining precise platforming with exploration.

● Capture and economy system. Catch different species of fish and sell your catches to earn money and invest in upgrades.

● Upgrades and equipment. Improve your abilities to reach previously inaccessible areas.

● Charming pixel art visual style. Appealing 2D art, expressive characters, and environments that visually evolve as you progress.

● Relaxing atmosphere with a constant sense of discovery. A cozy experience filled with curiosity and mystery, perfect for players who enjoy exploring at your own pace.
